seo.default_keywords: driving school, viktorija, driving lessons, driving courses, Estonia, Tallinn, driving license, category A, category B, category C

home.title: From Pedal Puzzler to Road Ace!
home.subtitle: Learn to drive so well that even your GPS will applaud your maneuvers!
home.description: Tired of being a passenger in your own life? At our driving school, you won't just get a license - you'll become a driver who isn't afraid of roundabouts and confidently takes the left lane!
home.button: License is Close → Click to Find Out How!

about.title: ABOUT US
about.subtitle: DRIVING SCHOOL Viktorija — TRAINING DRIVERS, NOT PASSENGERS!
about.description: Once upon a time in a small Estonian town, a dream was born: to create a place where people would not just get a driver's license, but truly learn how to drive a car.
about.button: Your license — our mission. Let's start together! →

features.title: Turning pedestrians into drivers since 1998!
features.subtitle: 🚗 Don't know how to drive? That's temporary!
features.description: Our driving school will help you master the art of driving and get your category B license. Experienced instructors, modern cars, and an individual approach to each student.
features.button: Park with us — and get your license! →

category_b.title: 🚗 Master the Road with Category B!
category_b.subtitle: Category B is your key 🔑 to freedom and independence! Drive passenger cars 🏎️ and conquer new horizons 🌍. Personal car, rental for trips, work or leisure – everything is possible now!
category_b.main_text: What's included in the courses? • Theory – 28 academic lessons • Driving – 28 academic lessons • First aid courses – 16 hours • Dark and slippery driving courses
category_b.highlight_text: 📋 What do you need to register?
category_b.main_text_continuation: 🆔 Passport or ID card 🩺 Medical certificate for category B
category_b.offer_title: 🔥 Start your journey to a driver's license today – the road is waiting for you! 🚦
category_b.button_text: Maneuver to your dream — sign up for the course! →
category_b.limit_text: Your license — our mission. Let's start together!

exam_prep.title: 🚦 PREPARATION FOR THE DMV EXAM
exam_prep.subtitle: The DMV exam is like a blind date: you never know how it will end.
exam_prep.main_text: But with us, you'll definitely have a second date! We'll prepare you so well that the inspector will doubt their own authority.
exam_prep.main_text_continuation: • Exam route simulator • Psychological preparation 'The inspector is human too' • Parallel parking (better open your eyes) • Good luck mantra from the director
exam_prep.offer_text: Study in your pajamas! Our courses are for those who want to learn traffic rules with a cat and a cup of tea. Forget about boring lectures! Includes: • Interactive lessons • Tests without the desire to jump out the window • Animated road situations • 24/7 access
exam_prep.limit_text: Overtake everyone on the road to your license!

category_a.title: 🏍️ Feel the freedom on two wheels with Category A!
category_a.subtitle: Category A is your opportunity to become a master of motorcycle control 🏁. Enjoy speed, maneuverability and unforgettable emotions 🌟.
category_a.main_text: 📋 What do you need to register? 🆔 Passport or ID card 🩺 Medical certificate for category A
category_a.highlight_text: 🔥 Become a real biker – start training today! 🛣️
category_a.button_text: Sign up for the motorcycle course →

first_aid.title: 🚑 First aid courses – an important step towards your safety!
first_aid.subtitle: In our driving school, you will learn skills that will help you respond correctly in emergency situations on the road and save lives.
first_aid.main_text: ✨ Why is this important? 💔 Help before the ambulance arrives can save a life. 🧠 You will learn to act in accidents, injuries and other critical cases. 🎓 A certificate of completing the courses is required for taking the exam.
first_aid.main_text_continuation: 📚 Theory and practice: real scenarios and working with mannequins. 🩺 Basic skills: resuscitation, stopping bleeding, and shock assistance.
first_aid.offer_title: 🔥 Register today and become a confident driver! 🚦

final_course.title: 🏁 The final stage on the way to your permanent license – get ready for victory!
final_course.subtitle: The final training course, winter driving – this is your last push towards successfully passing the exams for category A or B. We will do everything to make you feel confident and ready for any challenges on the road.
final_course.main_text: 📋 What do you need to register? 🆔 Passport or ID card 🩺 Medical certificate for category A or B
final_course.highlight_text: 🔥 Take the decisive step – start training and get your license soon! 🚦
final_course.button_text: Sign up for the final course →

multilingual.title: Multilingual support
multilingual.description: For teaching students from different countries

quote.text: Thanks to the individual approach and flexible schedule, I was able to get my license in just 2 months! The instructors are always available and ready to help.
quote.author: Anna Petrova

painpoints.title: Driving Categories - Choose Your Path to Freedom!
painpoints.subtitle: Once you learn to park with our instructors, parallel parking will no longer be your nightmare, but your morning warm-up.

a.title: 🏍️ Category A — When Two Pedals are Already Too Many!
a.description: Includes theoretical lessons on how to look cool in any situation. Perfect for those planning to carry passengers who will pretend they're not scared at all.
a.button: The Road Awaits Heroes — Become One!

b.title: 🚗 Category B. For Those Who Are Tired of Telling the Driver "Wrong Way!"
b.description: The most popular category for ordinary mortals! You'll learn that yellow at a traffic light is not a signal to "go faster!" (includes free philosophy lessons at traffic lights when you stall).
b.button: Shift to Dream Speed — Start Now!

c.title: 🎓 Final Course. The Last Dash to Your Dream License!
c.description: The home stretch to becoming "A Person with a License"! Individual lessons with instructors who will patiently explain for the 10th time that a roundabout is not a place to express creativity.
c.button: License is Close — Find Out How!
c.price_label: Investment in a Future Without Fear:
c.after_price: Priceless for those who want to pass the exam on the first try, rather than collecting retakes.

instructors.title: Our Experienced Instructors
instructors.subtitle: Professional team with many years of teaching experience

team.title: OUR TEAM: PEOPLE WHO LOVE THEIR WORK
team.subtitle: For more than 15 years, we've been turning uncertain pedestrians into confident drivers. During this time, our graduates have put so many kilometers on their car wheels that they could have reached the Moon and back... several times!
team.main_text: Our driving school employs not just instructors, but true steering wheel wizards.
team.instructor_description: — head and founder of the school, a legendary figure, theory guru, knows traffic rules better than his own home address. A driving instructor whose patience could be entered in the Guinness Book of Records. Even if you stall ten times in a row at a traffic light, he'll just smile and say: Let's try an eleventh time!
team.why_title: WHY US? BECAUSE WE ARE THE BEST!
team.testimonial: They truly care about each student here. My instructor Andrei took all my fears into account and helped me overcome them. Now I drive with such pleasure, as if I've been behind the wheel all my life! — Katrin, 34 years old
team.button: Maneuver towards your dream — sign up for a course! →
team.limit_text: We don't have teaching templates because each student is unique. Some are afraid of speed, some of turns, and some simply can't remember where the turn signal is. And that's normal!

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our driving school
faq.question1: How long does it take to get a license?
faq.answer1: The time it takes to get a license varies depending on the category and your learning pace. On average, it takes 1-3 months for Category B.
faq.question2: How many driving lessons will I need?
faq.answer2: The number of lessons depends on your previous experience and how quickly you learn. Most students need 20-30 hours for Category B.
faq.question3: What documents do I need to start learning?
faq.answer3: You'll need your ID, a medical certificate, and a passport photo. We'll help you with the paperwork.
faq.question4: When do I pay for the lessons?
faq.answer4: You can pay for the full course upfront with a discount, or pay in installments as you progress.
faq.question5: Can I take lessons in the evening or on weekends?
faq.answer5: Yes, we offer flexible scheduling including evenings and weekends to accommodate your busy schedule.
faq.question6: What if I fail my exam?
faq.answer6: If you fail your exam, we offer additional support and practice before you retake it. We're committed to your success.

logo_collection.title: Trusted by those who value professionalism on the road
logo_collection.description: When it comes to road safety, there are no random partners. That's why we collaborate with companies for whom driver professionalism is not just words, but a daily necessity.
